name: Notification box
objective: Send and receive messages intensively to/from several contacts while IM application is not launched
description: We want to make sure we can send and receive messages intensively to/from several contacts via the notification box
notes: Need to clarify how many notification boxes can be displayed and how?
pre_condition:
Registered to any IM service
Connected to network
A valid account created
Signed in as UserA
